author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Restore back geometries V11,  V12, V13, V14 of HGCal (present in C9, C10, C11, C12, C13, C14 of the calorimeter component and scenarios D49 ... D76) to its old form (orientation of the depleted layer wrt PCB)

#### PR validation:

Use the runTheMatrix test workflows 28234.0, 31834.0, 32634.0

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-hgx278 Restore back HGCal geometries V11, V12, V13, V14 to its old form
